com.rift.coad.daemon.messageservice
Interface MessageHandler

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface MessageHandler
extends java.rmi.Remote

The message handler interface is called by the message service to process a message.

Method Summary
 Message processMessage(Message msg)
          This method is called to process a message.
 

Method Detail

processMessage

Message processMessage(Message msg)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                              MessageServiceException
This method is called to process a message.

Parameters:
msg - The message to perform the processing on.
Returns:
The processed message. Cannot use IN/OUT as RMI does not support it.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MessageServiceException
